meanings.definition: Combine different beliefs or practices into one system.
meanings.sent1: The teacher helped us syncretize our ideas into a group project.
meanings.sent2: She likes to syncretize various art styles in her paintings.
meanings.sent3: Trying to syncretize pizza and ice cream might not be the best idea.
meanings.sent4: Her music syncretizes classical and modern elements seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The chef's recipe syncretized flavors from different cultures beautifully.

meanings.definition: Blend different elements into a unified whole.
meanings.sent1: Let's syncretize our efforts to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent2: The designer was able to syncretize traditional and modern fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally tried to syncretize my socks with different colors.
meanings.sent4: The artist's painting syncretizes colors in a harmonious way.
meanings.sent5: The team's strategy syncretized individual strengths into a powerful force.
